name: js-rtlsdr

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-js && npm run test-addon && npm run test-cpp
scripts.doc-js: rm -rf doc/* && jsdoc -d doc/ -c jsdoc.conf.json -t node_modules/jsdoc-baseline -r ./

readme:
# js-rtlsdr
A Node.js wrapper for librtlsdr.
